name: Eid Special Buffet
description: Celebrate Eid with a grand feast at Hotel Grand Plaza. The Eid Special Buffet offers a delightful range of traditional and continental dishes perfect for family and friends. Enjoy mouth-watering meals and a festive ambiance for only 1200 BDT.

name: Celebrity Iftar Evening
description: Break your fast in style with celebrities and influencers at the Celebrity Iftar Evening. Held at the elegant Banani Convention Center, this event offers great food, social interaction, and unforgettable memories at just 500 BDT.

name: Youth & Future Talkshow
description: Join inspiring youth leaders and visionaries at the Youth & Future Talkshow. This seminar aims to explore the challenges and possibilities of tomorrow, with meaningful conversations at the BRAC Centre Auditorium. Entry is just 500 BDT.

name: DU Convocation 2025
description: Celebrate academic excellence at the University Convocation 2025. A proud moment for graduates, families, and faculties alike, this grand event will be held at Dhaka University Field. Entry fee is just 100 BDT.

name: Live Piano Night
description: Experience the soothing charm of classical music at Live Piano Night. Set in the serene ambiance of The Westin Lounge, this event promises a magical evening of melodies for only 500 BDT.

name: Creative Events Expo
description: Explore innovation, design, and creativity at the Creative Events Expo. Hosted at BICC, this exhibition brings together thinkers, creators, and trendsetters. Whether you're a professional or curious explorer, enjoy the expo for just 300 BDT.

name: Jungkook Virtual Live
description: Join BTS's Jungkook in a thrilling virtual concert experience! Watch him perform live from the comfort of your home. The Jungkook Virtual Live is a must for K-pop fans, with tickets at just 800 BDT.

name: Neon Beats DJ Concert
description: Get ready to party at the Neon Beats DJ Concert! Dance under the stars at Army Stadium with electrifying beats and dazzling lights. An unforgettable concert experience awaits you for 1500 BDT.
